summary: Saved game from immediately before you choose your race.
descriptionHtml:
This save places you seconds before you choose your race, saving you 5 precious minutes you could be using to kill dragons. No cheats or anything else stupid, just a save. Pray to the Night Mother for the construction kit to come out soon so somebody can make a mod to skip the intro completely!

On Windows 7 place the saved game in C:\\Users\\[Your User Name]\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves
I don\'t have Windows XP so I don\'t know where it is located, although it will be somewhere under C:\\Documents and Settings\\[Your User Name]

The comments have spoken! The game will autosave for you at the same point, which I was not aware of, but the autosave will be overwritten if you don\'t manually back it up.
author: Yaosio
